trans-unit.source: Represents a header that encapsulates an address information item used to identify or interact with an endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个地址头，它包装的地址信息项用于标识终结点或与终结点进行交互。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressHeader> is characterized by a name and namespace and has a value that contains optional information used to identify or interact with an endpoint.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressHeader> 由名称和命名空间表示，并具有一个值，该值包含用于标识终结点或与终结点进行交互的可选信息。

trans-unit.source: The name can be accessed by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressHeader.Name%2A> property and the namespace by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressHeader.Namespace%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 名称可通过 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressHeader.Name%2A> 属性访问，命名空间可通过 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressHeader.Namespace%2A> 属性访问。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create address headers, access their properties, add them to a service endpoint and host the service using the endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建地址头，如何访问其属性，如何将其添加到服务终结点，以及如何使用终结点承载服务。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressHeader" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressHeader" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressHeader.CreateAddressHeader%2A> to create new <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressHeader> objects.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressHeader.CreateAddressHeader%2A> 创建新的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressHeader> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressHeader" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressHeader" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The object that contains the information item is serialized into the address header by an <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer> object.
trans-unit.target: 通过一个 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer> 对象将包含信息项的对象序列化到地址头中。

trans-unit.source: The information item for the address header.
trans-unit.target: 为地址头提供的信息项。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressHeader" /> class with a specified value.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的值创建 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressHeader" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressHeader" /> that contains the information item specified by the <paramref name="value" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 包含 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressHeader" /> 参数指定的信息项的 <paramref name="value" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create an address header using this method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用此方法创建地址头。

trans-unit.source: The information item for the address header.
trans-unit.target: 为地址头提供的信息项。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer" /> used to serialize the specified object in the <c>value</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 用于序列化 <c>value</c> 参数中的指定对象的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressHeader" /> class using a specified formatter to serialize the information item from a specified object.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressHeader" /> 类的新实例，使用指定的格式化程序对指定对象的信息项进行序列化。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressHeader" /> that contains the information item specified by the value parameter.
trans-unit.target: 包含 value 参数指定的信息项的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressHeader" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create an address header using this method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用此方法创建地址头。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="formatter" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="formatter" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The name of the address header.
trans-unit.target: 地址头的名称。

trans-unit.source: The namespace of the address header.
trans-unit.target: 地址头的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: The information item for the address header.
trans-unit.target: 为地址头提供的信息项。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressHeader" /> class with a specified value, name and namespace.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的值、名称和命名空间创建 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressHeader" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressHeader" /> with the specified <paramref name="name" /> and <paramref name="ns" /> that contains the information item specified by <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressHeader" /> 和 <paramref name="name" /> 并且包含 <paramref name="ns" /> 指定的信息项的 <paramref name="value" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create an address header using this method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用此方法创建地址头。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" /> or <paramref name="name" />.Length == 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 为 <see langword="null" /> 或 <paramref name="name" />.Length == 0。

trans-unit.source: The name of the address header.
trans-unit.target: 地址头的名称。

trans-unit.source: The namespace of the address header.
trans-unit.target: 地址头的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: The information item for the address header.
trans-unit.target: 为地址头提供的信息项。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer" /> used to serialize the specified object in the <c>value</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 用于序列化 <c>value</c> 参数中的指定对象的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressHeader" /> class with a specified name and namespace that uses a specified formatter to serialize the information item from a specified object.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定名称和命名空间创建 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressHeader" /> 类的新实例，该实例使用指定的格式化程序对指定对象的信息项进行序列化。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressHeader" /> with the specified <paramref name="name" /> and <paramref name="ns" /> that contains the information item specified by <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressHeader" /> 和 <paramref name="name" /> 并且包含 <paramref name="ns" /> 指定的信息项的 <paramref name="value" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create an address header using this method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用此方法创建地址头。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> or <paramref name="serializer" /> is <see langword="null" /> or <paramref name="name" />.Length == 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 或 <paramref name="serializer" /> 为 <see langword="null" />，或 <paramref name="name" />.Length == 0。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to compare with the object contained in the current address header.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前地址头包含的对象进行比较的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the information item in a specified object is equal to the object contained in the current address header.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定对象中的信息项是否与当前地址头包含的对象相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the information item in a specified <paramref name="obj" /> is equivalent to the information item contained in the current address header; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的 <paramref name="obj" /> 中的信息项等效于当前地址头包含的信息项，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: In particular, returns <see langword="false" /> if <paramref name="obj" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 特别是，如果 <see langword="false" /> 为 <paramref name="obj" />，则返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Checks for equivalence of serialized canonical XML between the information items.
trans-unit.target: 检查信息项之间序列化的规范化 XML 的等效性。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to call this method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns an XML reader that can serialize the current address header object.
trans-unit.target: 返回可对当前地址头对象进行序列化的 XML 读取器。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader" /> that can serialize the current address header object.
trans-unit.target: 可对当前地址头对象进行序列化的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to call this method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Provides a unique hash code for an address header.
trans-unit.target: 为地址头提供一个唯一的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: A unique hash code for the current address header.
trans-unit.target: 当前地址头的唯一哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: This is the string-based implementation.
trans-unit.target: 这是基于字符串的实现。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressHeader.GetHashCode%2A> is suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures like a hash table.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressHeader.GetHashCode%2A> 适用于哈希算法和哈希表之类的数据结构。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to call this method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Deserializes the information item from the current address header object.
trans-unit.target: 反序列化来自当前地址头对象的信息项。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressHeader.GetValue%60%601%28System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer%29> overload if you want to use a customized XML formatter; otherwise use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressHeader.GetValue%60%601> overload.
trans-unit.target: 如果要使用自定义 XML 格式化程序，请使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressHeader.GetValue%60%601%28System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer%29> 重载；否则使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressHeader.GetValue%60%601> 重载。

trans-unit.source: A class of type <c>T</c> with its fields and properties set to the values supplied by the current address header object.
trans-unit.target: 类型的类<c>T</c>其字段和属性设置为当前地址头对象所提供的值。

trans-unit.source: Deserializes the information item from the current address header to an object of a specified type.
trans-unit.target: 将来自当前地址头的信息项反序列化为具有指定类型的对象。

trans-unit.source: An instance of a class of type <paramref name="T" /> with its fields and properties set to the values supplied by the current address header object.
trans-unit.target: 一个类型为 <paramref name="T" /> 的类的实例，其字段和属性设置为当前地址头对象所提供的值。

trans-unit.source: When using this overload, you must supply a type for the generic parameter `T`.
trans-unit.target: 使用此重载时，必须为泛型参数 `T` 提供一个类型。

trans-unit.source: The type of the return value is determined by the generic type parameter.
trans-unit.target: 返回值的类型由该泛型类型参数确定。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressHeader.GetValue%60%601%28System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer%29> overload if you want to use a customized XML formatter.
trans-unit.target: 如果要使用自定义 XML 格式化程序，请使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressHeader.GetValue%60%601%28System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer%29> 重载。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to call this method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: A class of type <c>T</c> with its fields and properties set to the values supplied by the current address header object.
trans-unit.target: 类型的类<c>T</c>其字段和属性设置为当前地址头对象所提供的值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer" /> used to deserialize the information item from the current address header object.
trans-unit.target: 用于反序列化来自当前地址头对象的信息项的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer" />。

trans-unit.source: Deserializes the information item from the current address header to an object of a specified type that uses a specified formatter to serialize this information.
trans-unit.target: 将来自当前地址头的信息项反序列化为具有指定类型的对象，该对象使用指定格式化程序对此信息进行序列化。

trans-unit.source: An instance of a class of type <paramref name="T" /> with its fields and properties set to the values supplied by the current address header object.
trans-unit.target: 一个类型为 <paramref name="T" /> 的类的实例，其字段和属性设置为当前地址头对象所提供的值。

trans-unit.source: When using this overload, you must supply a type for the generic parameter `T`.
trans-unit.target: 使用此重载时，必须为泛型参数 `T` 提供一个类型。

trans-unit.source: The type of the return value is determined by the generic type parameter.
trans-unit.target: 返回值的类型由该泛型类型参数确定。

trans-unit.source: Use this overload only if you want to use a customized XML formatter; otherwise use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressHeader.GetValue%60%601> overload.
trans-unit.target: 仅当要使用自定义 XML 格式化程序时才使用此重载；否则，请使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressHeader.GetValue%60%601> 重载。

trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="serializer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="serializer" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: When implemented, gets the name of the address header.
trans-unit.target: 在实现时，获取地址头的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the address header.
trans-unit.target: 地址头的名称。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to access this property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何访问此属性。

trans-unit.source: When implemented, gets the namespace of the address header.
trans-unit.target: 在实现时，获取地址头的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: The namespace of the address header.
trans-unit.target: 地址头的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to access this property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何访问此属性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> used to write the address header contents to a stream or file.
trans-unit.target: 用于向流或文件写入地址头内容的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is invoked when the address header contents are written to a stream or file.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，在向流或文件写入地址头内容时调用。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> used to write the address header to a stream or file.
trans-unit.target: 用于向流或文件写入地址头的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is invoked when the address header contents begin to be written to a stream or file.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，在开始向流或文件写入地址头内容时调用。

trans-unit.source: Wraps the address header as a message header.
trans-unit.target: 将地址头包装为消息头。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader" /> that wraps the current address header.
trans-unit.target: 包装当前地址头的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to call this method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Writes the address header to a stream or file.
trans-unit.target: 向流或文件写入地址头。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressHeader.WriteAddressHeader%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressHeader.WriteAddressHeader%28System.Xml.XmlWriter%29> overloads provide interfaces to use in writing an address header to a stream or file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressHeader.WriteAddressHeader%2A> 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressHeader.WriteAddressHeader%28System.Xml.XmlWriter%29> 重载提供用于向流或文件写入地址头的接口。

trans-unit.source: Both call the abstract <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressHeader.OnWriteAddressHeaderContents%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter%29> method, so users must provide an implementation of this method to use these overloads.
trans-unit.target: 两种重载都调用抽象 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressHeader.OnWriteAddressHeaderContents%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter%29> 方法，因此用户必须提供此方法的实现才能使用这些重载。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> used to write the address header to a stream or file.
trans-unit.target: 用于向流或文件写入地址头的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Writes the address header to a stream or file using a specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> 向流或文件写入地址头。

trans-unit.source: This overload calls the abstract
trans-unit.target: 此重载调用抽象

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressHeader.OnWriteAddressHeaderContents%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter%29> method, so users must provide an implementation of that method to use this method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressHeader.OnWriteAddressHeaderContents%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter%29> 方法，因此用户必须提供该方法的实现才能使用此方法。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="writer" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 用于向流或文件写入地址头的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />。

trans-unit.target: 此重载将 <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> 包装为 <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter>，然后调用抽象
